S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4175 Instability in some replication tests under load, since tests don't wait long enough for final state or anticipate intermediate states
Patch derby-4175-3 (+ resolved some conflicts arising from commit of DERBY-3417).
It makes three replication tests less sensitive to load by making them accept intermediate states without failing or wait for longer before giving up on seeing the final end state of a replication state change.
